Project Description: Construct an iron filtration plant for Well No. 8

Install a granular activated carbon filter system at Well No.
4

Reconfiguration of Well #4 including raw transmission main
connecting to the new water treatment plant.

Construction of a new deep well and water treatment plant. The project will replace two existing wells that have tested
positive for PFAS.
Construction of a new well house, associated transmission main and system wide SCADA improvements.
Phase 1 Spring St. Water treatment plant renovations

Phase 2 Construction of new Well 13; abandonment of
Wells 4 & 7.
